stories.text:
I am building a single interface for all the data services like - file system/object storage, databases and message brokers.

As a developer myself, I constantly need to work with different storage systems that spans across multiple cloud platforms, VMs and OnPrem systems. Having a single interface speeds up the development and debugging process.

Features: - Lightweight interface for relational database, object storage and streaming data infrastructure - Connect and Browse AWS S3 Bucket - Query relational databases like - Postgresql, MySQL and MariaDB - Query NoSQL database - Cassandra - Manage multiple Kafka cluster and brokers.

The project is currently at an alpha stage, looking for feedback from the community.

Github Repo: https://github.com/heapland/heapland
